name: SSF1
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 1
subtitle: OBSOLETE - Carcinoembryonic Antigen (CEA)
notes: **Note**:  This CS Site-Specific Factor is obsolete beginning with CS Version 2 (codes, code descriptions, and notes).  Old data are retained during conversion, but new cases are not coded 000 080 or 999.  Use only code 988 for this field for all cases entered in CS Version 2.
rows:
OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

Test not done

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

Negative/normal; within normal limits

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

Borderline; undetermined whether positive or negative

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

Ordered, but results not in chart
Not applicable:  Information not collected for this schema

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
